title.rendered: New solution in partnership with Gfi : CyFENCE & SIEM Service

content.rendered:
In partnership since a year, Gfi and Cybelius have been working together to bring the best in industrial cybersecurity.

With the aim of innovation and research in cybersecurity, the two partners have developed the « CyFENCE & SIEM Service » solution. A service that does not yet exist on the market, which allows information systems managers a complete representation of their activity to better manage the security of their installation.

Read the press release.
